title: The Journey of Legend
overview: Xiao Mingming, a man who once loved martial arts novels but had his passion dulled by the realities of life. He experiences the world of martial arts through the perspective of the novel's protagonist, Xiao Qiushui. Starting as a young, impulsive swordsman with little skill, he eventually matures into a heroic figure who values loyalty and defends his family and country. After this journey, Xiao Mingming continues to write in his spare time, using his novels to convey the belief that righteousness brings people together.
